settings.heading: SPECIFICATIONS
settings.content:
-Developed by female doctors

-Gynecologically and dermatologically tested

-Free from allergens, alcohol and parabens

-Made in Sweden

-100% vegan

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
Pre-shave oil:  Apply to skin 1-2 minutes before shaving to provide a protective layer against the razor and soften skin and hair.

Shaving Foam:  Apply on top of the oil so that the razor slides comfortably over the skin and gives a gentle shave that does not irritate. Shake before use.

After-shave balm:  Rinse off the foam and wipe dry. Then apply after shave balm. Use immediately after shaving, morning and evening for 5 days and if necessary.

Daily Intimate Wash: For external use only. Pour into hand and apply. Rinse thoroughly.

Intimate Deospray: Shake well before use and spray from a distance of approximately 8-12 inches on the external vaginal area that is normally covered with hair as this is where the sweat glands are located. Can be used on shaved areas as well as non-shaved areas. For external use only.

Intimate Lubricant Drops: Pump a few drops and apply to skin. Do not use it with other silicone products. Compatible with natural rubber latex, polyisoprene and polyurethane condoms.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Pre shave Oil:  Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Olus Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Perfume, Glycine, Soybean (Soybean) Oil, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Camelina Sativa Oil, Tocopher , Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Citric Acid

Shaving Foam:  Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Propane, Butane, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Glycol Distearate, Perfume, Isobutane, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Glycine, Urea, Fructose, Niacin Chelidonine, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, PEG-14M, PEG-40, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Cocamide MEA, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, p-Anisic Acid, Iodopropynyl, D Butylcarbamylate, D , Sodium Benzoate

After Shave Balm:  Aqua, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Panthenyl Triacetate, Perfume, Naringanine, Chelidonine, Carbomer, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol

Daily Intimate Wash:Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lactic Acid, Polyquaternium-10, PEG-14M, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Citric Acid

Intimate Deospray: Butane, Isobutane, Dimethicone, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Propane, Isopropyl Myristate, Fragrance (Parfum), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Diethylhexyl Carbonate, Dimethiconol.

Intimate Lubricant Drops: Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Phenly Trimethicone

settings.text: Shaving is a trauma to the skin, so when not properly taken care of, it may cause irritation like ingrown hairs, razor burn and itching especially on highly sensitive vulvar skin. That is why we have developed our Intimate Shaving Trio - to not only shave but also to prepare and take care of the skin post-shave.

settings.title: Step 1
settings.text: Apply to the skin 1-2 minutes before shaving to provide a protective layer against the razor.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.text: Apply on top of the oil to allow the razor to glide seamlessly over the skin and provide a gentle, non-irritating shave.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text: Rinse off the foam and dry the area. Then apply after shave balm. Used immediately after shaving, as well as morning and evening for 5 days and if needed.

settings.title: WHY DO YOUR PRODUCTS CONTAIN PERFUME?
settings.text:
DeoDoc only uses hypoallergenic scents/perfumes in all of our products. Hypoallergenic scents are free from alcohol, allergens and irritants, therefore, they are safe for intimate skin.

Regular perfume should never be used in the intimate area as it contains:

- alcohol which can have a dehydrating effect

- allergens that can cause irritation

settings.title: IS IT SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN?
settings.text: Yes, our revolutionary 3-step shaving solution gives the optimal preparation for sensitive skin.

settings.title: ARE DEODOC'S PRODUCTS SAFE TO USE?
settings.text:
DeoDoc follows European Union regulations for the manufacturing of cosmetic products

- All products are approved by the Swedish Medical Products Agency

- DeoDoc ingredients and products fulfills the safety standards for area of use (i.e. Vulva-safe & vagina-safe dependent on product) according to EU regulations for cosmetic products

- Each product is gynaecologically tested which means they are tested on women outside of a lab environment

- Products are dermatologically tested for sensitive skin

- All of our products are developed together with DeoDoc's co-founder and Professor of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Dr. Gunvor Ekman Ordeberg

settings.title: HOW AND WHERE SHOULD I SPRAY THE DEOSPRAY?
settings.text: Shake the can and spray 15cm away from the vulva or groin area. The vulva has apocrine sweat glands which empty into hair follicles, so the DeoSpray should only be used where ever hair can grow. Do not use or spray within the inner labia, mucosa or inside of the vagina.
